attributes.action: Fine RETAILERS not checkout staff on £10,000 the £5,000 fine for selling alcohol to teens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Staff paid £10,000.00 per year should not be fined half their annual before tax salary for making one mistake, especially as the government trading standards department sends in old looking 17 year olds who look over 21 into shops to attempt to buy alcohol to catch people out. Is the prime minister going to give up half his salary for each mistake he makes and imprison himself for 6 months for each mistake too? Sign the petition and fight back against this outrageous situation.
